constituent: descendants, sun, day, compare, spoon, sitting on the ground, spoon2, sitting on the ground2
heisigStory: By comparing apes with anthropoids, we not only discover the latter have descended from those progenitors educated in the higher branches, but that the very idea of seeing everything descended from everything else, one way or another, means that there is "nothing new UNDER the sun."
koohiiStory1: Grandparent spends all DAY COMPARING photos of their DESCENDANTS.
koohiiStory2: Japanese people have compared themselves as being descendants of the sun. (Amaterasu, the sun godesss). Sun, comparing = descendants.
myStory: cháu. hậu duệ. côn trùng. ngày so sánh xem cháu chắt thế nào
